title: Nokia PureBook X14 Core i5 10th Gen - (8 GB/512 GB SSD/Windows 10 Home) NKi510UL85S Thin and Light Laptop  (14 inch, Black, 1.1 kg)

product_specification.Sales Package: Laptop, Power Adaptor, User Guide with Warranty Terms and Conditions
product_specification.Clock Speed: 1.6 GHz with Turbo Boost Upto 4.2 GHz
product_specification.USB Port: 2 x USB 3.1, 1 x USB 2.0, 1 x USB 3.1 Type C
product_specification.Screen Type: Full HD LED Backlit IPS Display with Dolby Vision
product_specification.Sound Properties: Dolby Atmos Best Expereinced with Headphones, Dolby Access App with Multiple Pre-set Audio Modes and Settings
product_specification.Additional Features: 46.7 WHr Battery, Magnesium Aluminium Alloy Body
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year Onsite Warranty Commencing from the Date of Purchase
product_specification.Covered in Warranty: Warranty will Cover Only Functional Parts, Issues having Manufacturing Defects
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: Does Not Cover Damages to the Product Resulting from Unauthorised Adaptations/ Adjustments/ Tampering/ Repair, Improper Installation or Placement, Mishandling, Improper Use, Deviation from the Instructions Set Out in the User Manual (If Applicable) Normal Wear and Tear Caused Due to Use of the Product.

product_description.Lightweight and Sleek: With a net weight of just 1.1 kg, this laptop feels light and easy to carry around wherever you go. Featuring a premium magnesium-aluminum alloy body, the Nokia PureBook looks classy and stylish with a matte black finish.
product_description.Dolby Vision and Dolby Atmos: Get a highly engaging user experience every time with smart visuals and HD audio. The Dolby Vision technology makes every visual spring to life in rich detail and realistic clarity. Also, enjoy spatial audio with Dolby Atmos that can be best experienced with a pair of headphones.
product_description.10th Gen Intel Core i5 Processor: Experience fast processing power with the Intel Core i5 10th Gen processor that offers up to 1.6 GHz base frequency and up to 4.2 GHz turbo frequency. The quad-core processor, along with 6 MB Intel smart cache memory, offers advanced parallel processing that makes multitasking look effortless and efficient.
product_description.Faster and Efficient Processing: Enjoy the ease of faster boot-up time, quick file transfer, smooth online surfing, instantaneous app launch with the Nokia PureBook. Functioning along with the advanced 8 GB of DDR4 RAM, the inbuilt 512 GB NVMe SSD provides a super smooth performance that is three times more efficient than standard SSDs.
product_description.Windows 10 Home: Nokia PureBook comes with preinstalled Windows 10 OS. You can experience seamless accessibility with the Windows Hello face recognition feature. You can also access thousands of apps, inbuilt security features, Cortana voice assistant, and other productivity features to cater to every need. Also, you can get a 1-month free trial of MS Office 365.
product_description.Immersive Viewing Experience: Feel your eyes being captivated by the 35.56 cm (14) Full HD LED-backlit IPS display. It is also powered by Dolby Vision, with 4.8mm slim bezels, and an 86% screen to body ratio. With an expansive color palette of about 16.7 million colors, 250 nits brightness, and up to 178° viewing angle, you can experience high-on-detail visuals with accurate color reproduction regardless of the screen positioning.
product_description.Smart Accessibility and Secure Login: The Nokia PureBook is packed with smart inbuilt features that make your overall user experience easy, efficient, and secure. The HD IR webcam, featuring Windows Hello Face recognition, offers instant and secure login access. With this laptop, you can maximize your productivity with smooth transitions and efficient command input using the Precision TouchPad. Also, the backlit keyboard, with up to 1.4 mm of key travel and adjustable brightness, is designed for effortless and convenient operation.
product_description.Integrated Intel Ultra HD Graphics: This laptop comes with an Intel UHD 620 inbuilt graphics card and up to 1.1 GHz Turbo GPU to offer an immersive visual experience in every pixel. Also, you can get a highly immersive and seamless viewing experience with 4K-support-enabled Intel Quick Sync Video, Intel InTru 3D technology, and Intel Clear Video HD technology.
product_description.All Round Connectivity: You can easily connect or pair this laptop to a wide range of smart devices, thanks to the extensive range of connectivity ports, such as two USB 3.1, one USB 2.0, one USB Type-C 3.1, one HDMI, one RJ45, and one Audio Out-Mic In port.
product_description.Enjoy Spotify Premium (Offer Valid Until: You can get a free subscription to Spotify Premium for up to 6 months on the purchase of this laptop. With this subscription, you can enjoy your favorite songs and podcasts without getting disturbed by any ads. Also, you can choose from over 4 billion playlists spanning moods and moments, and podcasts across genres. This offer is valid until April 2021. The voucher code will be shared within 30 days after product delivery.

review: Amazing experience from the time the package was opened till now. It's been 2 weeks. Super light weight, fantastic face recognition and sound and ui experience. Great battery backup. Camera is great. Great value, happy that I made this quality choice without spending too much !

I am a stereotypical tech-nerd, so in case of using any gizmo I am biased to be critical towards a product. However this new laptop truly amazed me. It is very rare to get a market disruptor in the field of laptop(s). But in this case I have found a hidden treasure. Nokia as a brand has been in the market for quite some time and with this new entrant, it is here to stay in the laptop market.

I was charmed by the built of the laptop. Sturdiness of the metal alloy body puts in a great confidence in carrying it. Small things like the quality of its hinge mechanism point out to the great engineering gone into it. In spite of all this it comes as a feathery 1.1kg machine.
Moving on to the usability. This laptop comes with dolby vision-atmos compatibility. The industry knows that to be a mark of high end notebooks. Needless to say that media consumption is simply exceptional. The display is crisp and bright, with great colour accuracy.
Day to day performance and utility is great as it is meant to be.
thumbs up

Over All Laptop is good but according to the price you will get much better then this . Build quality is really Good . I love the face lock it's very quick in dark also. You will enjoy this product as it's NOKIA .

Loved the brand new Nokia Laptop.Its is a very very light and the speed is just wow👌High specs under 60k is worth buying.The built quality is also good .Worth buying for students.The face unlock system is most appreciated.Go for this product 100%

Alright guys, I recently purchased NOKIA PUREBOOK. I am amazed with the performance of the laptop. I had few more options with the same price range but instead I tried my hands on NOKIA. Because everyone knows how NOKIA delivers. I am very much thankful for delivering this amazing product. So far I have been using laptop and I did not face even a single issue till now. Battery backup is fantastic, it will last around 7 hours, which is more than enough I believe. Then comes the performance. I have installed few moderate level games and python software and believe me guys, it's dead smooth. There is no heating issue as such. You give get an option to start/ stop internal fan as per your usage. But till now I I did face any heatings issues. Look wide it's fantastic. It's completely matt finish and you will love it. It's quite light in weight. Which is the major highlight part. And I also heard that it's lighter than macbook. So Nokia has delivered something which is unbelievable. Thnk you so much for the product.
The only issue which I have is, delivery options. I wanted a quicker deliver option, but unfortunately flipkart does not have that option. This is the sad part. I urge you guys to work on this. Because sometimes, people need products on urgent basis. And you guys did not respond to me at all. I was disappointed with the way you guys responded to me.

Review After 10 days of usage...as this is my first laptop (earlier iPad user), i like the performance. As, I am basic user battery lasts for minimum of one day. I watched Dolby vision + Dolby Atmos videos using my apple airpods...simply marvellous... display awesome... it takes approximately 2 hours to charge from 10% to 100%... as it weighs only 1.1 kg, you may feel like nothing... speakers good and loud enough...

Tie system is great and the built quality is also very good
Design is smooth and shiny and the best things is brand NOKIA

I bought this laptop with a lot of inhibitions, but seems to be a good buy. I was looking for a laptop for personal use. I am not at all a technical guy & my criteria were as follows :
1. 14 inch
2. 512GB SSD
3. Light weight
4. Backlit keyboard
5. Decent webcam.
6. Good sound quality
Would have perhaps bought the Mi but its a direct Chinese brand. Dell Latitude & HP were the next obvious choice but all the above features wasn't available at that price range, hence bought this laptop.
It's a lovely machine - feather light, quick & build quality is really good.
If you can afford to take risks & not scared of trying new brands, please go for it!

Bought this product after watching a review by GeekyRanjit. Wanted a high performance laptop which was light and didn’t cost the moon. This laptop hits the right notes on all three aspects. It’s been a month since I’ve been using this and so far I am completely delighted by the experience. Great product at this price point. Good for streaming Netflix with its Dolby Vision. Great processor so super fast. And at 1.1 kg, it’s among the lightest laptops in the market. The build is pretty high quality too. This could be a game changer for Nokia.

Ultra Light Laptop with good performance

Fast processing laptop value for money

- Good display from every angle
- boot speed is about 3,4 sec
- battery is long Lasting about to 6,7 hours
- keyboard is pretty good decent key travel is good
- Trackpad is much preety good but not excellent


This is not a gaming laptop not recommended.
If you are traveler person then this is best choice.
It's build quality is superb it is aluminium chesis
It's not like other laptop
At the end
Recommended for daily office work and students
If you are multimedia consumer then this laptop is perfect for you

Having many ports on this one as compared to other laptop.. so go for it if you have budget below 60k

I bought this laptop for 49.9k which is best deal.
I'm satisfied with this purchase and the laptop exceeds my expectations... The keys could have been slightly spaced better but you'll get used to it. It's ultra light and easy to carry.

Thank you for a nice product like this. Booting and shutdown speed is in very few secs. The lightweight laptop is an added advantage. It's better to have MS office by default at this price. I would like to recommend this laptop since there is no glitch in programming, zoom/google calls, etc.

For me it's a complete package. The laptop is so slim and sleek that it looks asthetic . It feels so premium as it has a metal chassy . And also it is sooo light weight or feels like you're holding a thin metal sheet .

And the display quality is gorgeous.

It is worth every penny you give.

The sound is also loud and produces good sound.

And gives around 5-6 hours of battery on moderate usage.

It doesn't have a fingerprint scanner but it has iris scanner
Which is so accurate and lightening fast.
It just takes less than 1 sec to recognise my eyes and not up the laptop .

And as it has a ssd in it. The boot times are crazy fast like 3-4 sec to boot up and 2 sec for shutdown.

I totally loved this product.

This is my honest review after 1 week of usage.

Go for it. You'll not regret it.

Got this laptop for 46000 rupees with bank discounts. This is the best i5 laptop in this price range.
First I had a confusion with Mi Notebook 14 and Nokia purebook. After some research, I went for Nokia.
The only better thing in MI Notebook when compared to this is the 2GB GPU.

The best highlights of this laptop is the weight and looks. Even though the laptop is not from the Nokia (flipkart is the manufacturer), the Nokia brand name on the laptop looks classy.

Overall it's a good purchase for me. Good Sound, Good picture quality.
I tried some Dolby Atmos movies from Netflix.
Also I upgraded to windows 11 Dev release from this laptop and it works super smooth. Thanks for the SSD!!
The backlit keyboard and the integrated webcam which has the ability to recognize face is an added advantage.

You can go for it without any doubt for a price range below 50k, if you are reading this review in 2021.

The laptop is ultra light weight and easy to carry. Performance is extremely good. Build quality is top notch. Display is crisp and bright. Speaker is loud and clear. Battery life is excellent. Overall, good package and value for money.

Laptop is very premium... but please keep in mind, buy this laptop only if you want thin, light and compact one...this is small in size...maybe the smallest you've seen till now... size comparable to macbook air 13.3"
Another thing is touchpad, I don't find touchpad very good and responsive, may have been better.
But seriously if you keep in mind these things you won't regret it buying..i guarantee

1. Performance is as expected for an i5 with 8gb ram..no surprises there
2. Display is surprisingly good.
3. Keyboard feels a bit odd. But I think it's a matter of getting used to (backlight is helpful)
4. Battery is as expected. 4-5 Hours in average performance.
5. It feels super solid, very premium look and finish. Absolutely adore it. Gets smudged easily (which doesn't really bother)
6. Window hello & trusted devices feature is a great addition.

It's super light and loaded with features. Excellent for anything except gaming and AV content creation.

I suggest you go and grab this amazing purebook available at most trusted e-commerce company i.e Flipkart.
Best Performance.
Great Display which can play videos of great quality i.e 4k.
Great RAM management.
Really amazing NVMe SSD.
Dolby Atmos and Dolby Vision give you an ultimate Experience.

At last thank you Flikart and Nokia for this amazing experience.

Since Nokia is not associated with laptops, I was a bit skeptical about this. But this laptop really matches up very comfortably to some of the more expensive laptops out there. The laptop body is premium and yet very light. 10th gen i5 combined with SSD and 8 GB RAM results in everything being super fast. Though my usage is mostly Word and PPT etc, and haven't played any heavy games on this. It doesn't get heated even after continuous Zoom calls, and sound quality is as promised. The sound is even more amazing over headphones, with Dolby enabled. Overall, a great deal.

Super laptop very nice just book this laptop and see the performance what a laptop seriously ull fall in love it's better than all laptop like HP, LENOVO,DELL, NO other company can bet Nokia if u need compare no other company can giv this build quality excellent laptop..

Good build quality,Display is just super and performance is like butteer smooth.Sound output quality is very good with Dolby vision atmos. Coolest feature is it is ultra light weight and we need to take care while typing.. This laptop is useful for frequent traveller's and and who needs light weight machine.Finally thanks to NOKIA and Flipkart for making such a beautiful Machine.😍

Recommended for office work , business use , college students .
I purchased NOKIA laptop at rupees 49990 on 09 aug 2021 and delivered on 11 aug .
I trusted to buy NOKIA laptop from Flipkart because it is from Flipkart itself . Purchase one mouse and keyboard so that inbuilt mouse would be fine for long time .

I brought this laptop for 46500/- in the recent discounts available. In this range of less then 50k this is the best laptop available in i5... It is super fast.. Currently using its since last three days in daily business use. Have absolutely no issues as of now... No heating issue.. The sound of the fan is aslo negligible you won't be able to make out the noise from laptop...the sound quality even without headphones is amazing gives you feel of dolby sound..The best part about the laptop is the weight.. That gives a premium effect.. If you are looking for new laptop in i5 and if you get this again in less then 50k don't miss out on this powerful machine

Nice Laptop.

2. Light weight 1Kg
3. Processor & RAM in this price range is impossible All features in this price range, HP laptop would cost near 1L
4. Classic look and metal alloys body material
5 Best for movie watching experience Dolby vision & Dolby Atoms effects

Kay pad 4 stars

A topclass lightweight slim laptop with the right features for multitasking. Excellent sound and easy to handle. No issues faced till date (it's been over 2 week). Excellent display and viewing angles.

However type C charging port should have been provided by default. A full charge does last about for 4 hrs on medium tasks. 6hrs would have been ideal. From a price perspective this should have been priced at 45 to 48k being an i5 10th Gen.

So far the best.........Box looks very simple.......

Positives:
Laptop is Feather Light........Matte Black as topping is so apt and blissful...........Sound and Display look better than expected ........Yet to check the Battery and charging section.........Boots up in less than 10 seconds........Windows Hello as authentication is beast at work......Performance stands out of all ........getting all these bountiful features at this price quote is For sure an Amazing deal.........

Negatives:
1.Hinge Mechanism is on the weaker side......not that worst but could be sensitive for rough users.

2. Attractive to dust, matte black is amazing and fantastic lookwise but surface of the laptop attracts dust particles.


Go for it and Feel this Feather lighted Beast Performing in ur hands

Loved the way it feels in Hand...Light like feather...Full Metal Body....
Ligthing Fast for day to day tasks...Boots up in seconds....battery is also good...around 8 - 9 hrs of normal usages with brightness @ 30%

This is an excellent product from Nokia. A reasonably well-priced and well-built laptop.

It's very lightweight and its performance is good even though it has a one-year-old processor.

And it comes with an awesome screen with a good level of visiblity, though audio output could have been improved.

Overall a very good product and if you are thinking to buy it in 2021 then definitely go for it you will not regret it.

It's a terrific product ever launched like in every angle considering the price it's the best. And what's less when you can have windows 11 also in this laptop ( I m using it's insider program and the features of 11 are fascinating )

Pro
Everything in it is a pro like buying it is a pro.

Precaution
Battery is good like it works for 5-6 hrs but if you try to download the 100gb game then it decreases to 3-4 hrs . Otherwise you can download the game in hard disk and use it , laptop's battery will not change.

Con
Cortana doesn't work at my place.

An amazing product by Nokia. The laptop is very light but very sturdy at the same time. Battery backup is average. I haven't used it much. It is not very good for gaming but overall a great laptop at this price range.
Best purchase within this price range, light weight and beautiful design. Smooth operation and speed. Face unlock is awesome. Best 14" laptop.

A light , yet powerful laptop that breezes thru the day to day WFH home tasks. The Dolby vision and audio are just wonderfully integrated and watching movies/online classes is a treat.
I bought it for the brand value Nokia, though it is sold by Flipkart with Nokia brand name. Coming to the weight distribution, it is so light to carry and you could just slip it into your bag on the go.
SSD is fast and I plan to upgrade to 16 GB. Called Flipkart support to get a Service centre contact point.
Overall fully loaded laptop with all the essential features for running moderate to powerful office tasks. I am not a gamer and think this is not a gaming laptop.
Go for it

Currently am using this laptop for my WFH it almost like 10 + hours work. Some how I will take some break. But the charge last longing more than 9+ hours. For full charging it took around 2 hours. Performance wise it is Good Awesome Worth for the Penny. Camera also Good. Am using this laptop for the last 1 week I didn't feel anything bad on this laptop.

My review is after using this laptop after 2 weeks.
Usage: Office work, few heavy software's

Pros:
1) Lightweight: This product is surely for someone who carry there laptop places to places.
1.1 KG feels super light. Overall build quality is good.
2) Picture and sound quality: Its above average but not something which will blow your mind.
3) Performance: SSD works as per its standard , i can open chrome, VSCode and other software within a second.
4) Battery performance is up to 6 to 6.5 hours.

Cons:
1) No office pre-installed. This is something everyone wants prebuild in the system.
2) USB sockets when plugged in for mouse, detached and reattached frequently makes a irritating noise.
3) No HDD support and cant update increase storage past 512 GB
Good for office work

Pros:
Built - Super solid, unlike other laptops in the range

Weight - This is a key Differentiator.. it's so Light to fall in love with it especially if you've tired using bulky office laptops of Dell, Lenovo etc..

Sound - Good, but not Great. But excellent when compared with peers

The Laptop is Very Good. But has few issues with the keys design. The Laptop is not good for anyone who use MS Excel most of the time. all the functions key have different functions. The F1 key works as Less Display Brightness and F2 works as more Display Brightness. Similarly the combination keys like Ctrl + F4 make the speaker off and does not close the app that was open. the F5 key does not refresh, instead it reduces the volume. so this laptop may not be good for someone who uses the short key very much and will find it very difficult to us. For all other usage it is pretty good to use. This Laptop did not fully fit my requirement as I do use Excel quite some time and I have to use the mouse now more to do the changes in the excel.

Excellent Laptop for Casual Users and Students. The build quality is decent, and the performance is great. The screen is great for all kind of media content and viewing angles are good too. It's very light weight and nimble, and perfect for someone who travels a lot. The keyboard is a but mushy, but that should not be problem per se, as the typing is good, and you can always use an external keyboard if needed. Touchpad is decent and the button placement of touchpad is not so great. The best part is that the laptop does not get heated up easily even with performance intensive apps running. Battery back up is great too. Been using the laptop for an hour everyday for the past 4 days and I still have a charge around 40%.

pros.Build Quality: The laptop weighs just 1.1 kg which makes it super light-weight and easier to carry around. The metal alloy body makes it sturdy.
pros.Face Recognition: Accurate and lightning fast face recognition unlock.
pros.46.7 WHr Battery: Battery lasts long, upto 6-7 hours on good usage.
pros.Performance: The Intel 10th Gen core i5 processor gives amazing performance.
pros.Dolby Atmos Sound: The Dolby Atmos sound gives the best user experience.

cons.Backlit Keyboard (with 1.4mm Key Travel): Poor keyboard quality. Could have been better.

summary.verdict: This laptop is a value for money with some of its amazing features such as light-weight, face recognition, dolby atmos sound and super-fast processor. Great buy for anyone.
summary.Additional Information: Metallic body with matte black finish, No numbers keyboard, Supports 4k videos, Expandable SSD and RAM
